definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: What is it about the tropics that so fosters biodiversity?
sentences.chinese: 是什么让热带地区的生物物种这么繁多呢？

sentences.english: To those people who resided within the tropical zones old coconut shells and mussel shells were commonly employed.
sentences.chinese: 居住在热带地区的人普遍采用老椰子壳和贻贝壳。

sentences.english: Native to tropical South America, peanuts were introduced early into the Old World tropics.
sentences.chinese: 花生原产南美热带，很早就传到东半球热带地区。

sentences.english: The coconut palm is common in tropical regions all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 在椰子树是常见于热带地区世界各地的游客。
热带地区出产甘美的水果。

sentences.english: I'm going to go somewhere tropical for a week or two.
sentences.chinese: 我要到热带地区待上一两个礼拜。

sentences.english: Ashley Tisdale: I like to visit tropical places on vacation because I love the beach.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在休假时去热带地区，因为我喜欢沙滩。

sentences.english: Hibiscus flowers are a familiar flower to be found in tropical regions including the Hawaiian Islands.
sentences.chinese: 木槿花是一种热带地区包括夏威夷岛上常见的花卉。

sentences.english: The earth's tropics teem with species.
sentences.chinese: 地球上的热带地区物种繁多。

sentences.english: Schistosomiasis afflicts hundreds of millions of people in tropical areas.
sentences.chinese: 在热带地区，血吸虫病折磨着千百万人。

sentences.english: The drummers beat out their tropical music,and the women danced.
sentences.chinese: 鼓手们敲奏出热带地区风格的曲调，妇女们跳起舞来。

sentences.english: Lake Xinghu is a typical eutrophic lake consisting of 6 sub-lakes in tropical Guangdong Province.
sentences.chinese: 星湖位于广东省，是一个热带地区的湖泊。

sentences.english: In the tropics numerous glaciers have disappeared altogether.
sentences.chinese: 热带地区大量的冰川已经一起消失。

sentences.english: He brisked up his pace at the beautiful sight.
sentences.chinese: 在热带地区可以看到美丽的落日余晖。

sentences.english: Gum trees grow in tropical areas.
sentences.chinese: 产树胶的树生长在热带地区。

sentences.english: Daddy longlegs are very widely distributed in temperate regions and in the tropics.
sentences.chinese: 分布广泛，温带和热带地区均可见。

pinyin: Ma3 da2 jia1 si1 jia1 Dao3

definition: Arecaceae or Palmae, the palm family
America (including North, Central and South America)/the Americas/abbr. for 亞美利加洲|亚美利加洲[Ya4 mei3 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
Africa/abbr. for 阿非利加洲[A1 fei1 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
Borneo island (of Indonesia, Malaysia and Brunei)
